description: List job production plans with filtering
permissions: Access is granted per JobProductionPlanPolicy scope: admins; broker members; customer managers; customer operations members with permitted roles (e.g., created by, notifying crew laborer, time card approver, subscriber, project manager, planner for customer, labor manager) and eligible plan statuses; and material supplier members for plans using their material sites.
validation_notes: Either --start-on or --start-on-min is required. Dates use YYYY-MM-DD. --start-time-min/--start-time-max use HH:MM; --start-at-min/--start-at-max and --job-site-active-around use ISO 8601. --status accepts editing, submitted, rejected, approved, cancelled, complete, abandoned, scrapped. --default-time-card-approval-process accepts admin or field. Boolean filters expect true/false values; numeric filters expect numbers. --practically-start-on-between expects date1|date2. --reference-data requires key|value pairs. Comma-separated values are required where indicated.

flags.name: --start-on
flags.description: Exact start date(s), comma-separated (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --start-on-min
flags.description: Start of date range (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --start-on-max
flags.description: End of date range (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.description: Filter by status (editing/submitted/rejected/approved/cancelled/complete/abandoned/scrapped)
